author: Frank Thelen
description: "I wanted to create a drink that is easy to make using ingredients that are available around the World. The basic inspiration was the classic BACARD√ç Daiquiri, for me one of the best drinks ever invented. The name "Under My Skin" is inspired firstly by the ingredients that, when combined, will get under your skin; secondly by the Frank Sinatra song "Under My Skin" about a woman he can never get enough of. This is the impression I wanted to create with this drink."
name: Under My Skin

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled absinthe misted glass
